biotools.summary: ExPheWas is a browser for gene-based pheWAS associations. The ExPheWas browser showcases the results of a phenome-wide association study (PheWAS) using an approach that models the joint effect of variants at protein coding genes.

bioschemas.name: ExPheWas
bioschemas.summary: ExPheWas is a browser for gene-based pheWAS associations. The ExPheWas browser showcases the results of a phenome-wide association study (PheWAS) using an approach that models the joint effect of variants at protein coding genes.
